summary: The nations of the Earth unite in a common cause to fight off an invader from outer space.
cast: Ryô Ikebe|Kyôko Anzai|Minoru Takada|Koreya Senda|Len Stanford|Harold Conway|George Whitman|Elise Richter|Hisaya Itô|Yoshio Tsuchiya|Nadao Kirino|Kôzô Nomura|Fuyuki Murakami|Ikio Sawamura|Takuzô Kumagai|Katsumi Tezuka|Mitsuo Tsuda|Tadashi Okabe|Osman Yusuf|Malcolm Pearce|Leonard Walsh|George Wyman|Yasuhisa Tsutsumi|Dona Carlson|Kisao Hatamochi|Kôichi Satô|Yasuo Araki|Heinz Bodmer|Rinsaku Ogata|Yutaka Oka|Shigeo Katô|Saburô Kadowaki|Keisuke Yamada|Yukihiko Gondô|Kôji Kamimura|Shinjirô Hirota|Akio Kusama|Obel Wyatt|Andrew Hughes
title: Batalla en el espacio
